channel.title: Data Feeds on OPRAmachine Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Data Feeds on OPRAmachine Documentation

item.title: JSON Data Feeds
item.description: You can get JSON structured data out of OPRAmachine by simply adding “.json” to the end of a feed URL. Examples Successful OPRA requests (JSON)

item.title: RSS Feeds
item.description: You can use RSS feeds to obtain data on requests and responses sent via the OPRAmachine platform. On most URLs of the site, you can simply preface links with /feed/ in order to obtain an RSS feed for a particular public body, user or request. Local news websites have incorporated the RSS feeds by allowing their readers to view requests for a given government, such as a county or municipal government.
